awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  A Request for Funds  to Purchase a 165K Actuator
awd_abstract_narration: This is an equipment grant to provide support for acquisition                   of structural testing equipment to upgrade the dynamic                          experimental research capability at the University of Maine.                                                                                                    The major testing equipment to be acquired is a 165-k actuator                  with a 6-inch stroke.  This will enable a variety of steel-plate                sheer wall specimens to be tested under cyclic loads simulating                 seismic conditions.                                                                                                                                             The support will enhance a research project under way at the                    University and also greatly improve the experimental capability                 to conduct future laboratory research.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
